name: CardsOfMagick
description:
CardsOfMagick is a real time card game rogue like where you fight through increasing hordes of enemies and upgrade your deck of spell cards.

It is currently in pre-alpha and in continuous development.  I plan to release it some day on steam for a small price of 1 to 2 € :)

I have a small discord server for dev updates, concept/feature discussions and ideas

https://discord.gg/3TPQXGtHPK

I do not plan to add any kind of microtransactions. I live by the buy once-get everything ideology when it comes to video games :)
